name: Mayhem (Ensignia)
overview: A single player shooter set in the year 2495 where 4 convicts have managed to escape from their prison cells about a police vessel. They also managed to bypass the security code to gain access to a docking craft. They are escaping! All patrol ships in the vicinity are instructed to use Code 1: Shoot to Kill. The convicts managed to reach the asteroid fields where they are believed to have a hide-out. A special department of police are in charge of their capture. That means you! Fly your ship around the convict strongholds avoiding or blasting threats and opening switches to allow access to the hidden areas where hey are hiding.
